name: satucommit
description: AI Agent helper for generating semantic git commits with gitmoji

/satucommit generate.example: User types: /satucommit generate -t feat -s auth -d add login

/satucommit interactive.description: Interactive mode to build commit message

aiAgent.howItWorks: When AI agent detects a slash command from this config, it should execute the corresponding terminal command
steps: 1. AI agent reads this config file
2. User types a slash command (e.g., /satucommit quick)
3. AI agent detects the command from slashCommands mapping
4. AI agent executes the terminal command (e.g., satucommit quick)
5. satucommit analyzes staged changes and generates semantic commit message

examples.userInput: /satucommit generate -t feat -s api -d add CRUD operations
examples.aiAction: Execute terminal command: satucommit generate -t feat -s api -d add CRUD operations

installation.globalInstall: After running install.sh or install.bat, satucommit is installed globally via npm link
installation.availableCommands: You can use 'satucommit' command from anywhere in your terminal
